body_html:
If you need to compile from source for whatever reason. Cross compile off of docker and DO NOT USE the armv7 settings. Instead use something like PI_ONE.
It's all here
$ tensorflow/tools/ci_build/ci_build.sh PI tensorflow/tools/ci_build/pi/build_raspberry_pi.sh PI_ONE
body_text:
If you need to compile from source for whatever reason.  Cross compile off of docker and DO NOT USE the armv7 settings.  Instead use something like PI_ONE.
It's all here
$ tensorflow/tools/ci_build/ci_build.sh PI tensorflow/tools/ci_build/pi/build_raspberry_pi.sh PI_ONE
body:
If you need to compile from source for whatever reason.  Cross compile off of docker and DO NOT USE the armv7 settings.  Instead use something like PI_ONE.  
[It's all here](https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_raspbian)
`$ tensorflow/tools/ci_build/ci_build.sh PI tensorflow/tools/ci_build/pi/build_raspberry_pi.sh PI_ONE`
